channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ohio voters dismiss false claims about Haitians, but Trump has slight lead, Post poll finds
item.description: Key Senate race is essentially tied between Democrat Sherrod Brown and Republican Bernie Moreno

item.title: Biden touts economic gains, acknowledges a long way to go
item.description: Interest rate cut "is not a declaration of victory, it’s a declaration of progress."

item.title: Joe Biden preps to sell the economy — to boost his legacy and help Harris
item.description: Biden is determined to convince a skeptical public that he strengthened the economy.

item.title: Harris dismisses Trump as ‘not serious’ on the economy in MSNBC interview
item.description: It was her first solo interview with a national network as the Democratic presidential nominee.

item.title: Seniors Worried About Rising Costs of Illegal Immigration Told to Suck It Up by Their Mayor
item.description: In what has to be one of this year’s most outrageous examples of disregard for American citizens in favor of illegal aliens, one callous Maine politic...

item.title: Trump returns to Pennsylvania, with a stop in Biden’s hometown
item.description: Get the latest news from the 2024 campaign trail in the contest between Vice President Kamala Harris and former president Donald Trump.

item.title: Janet Yellen Defends Her Record – and Delivers a Warning
item.description: The Treasury secretary is defending her legacy — and warning that the stability of the U.S. economy is at stake.

item.title: FEMA Faces Stormy Weather over Migrant Funding
item.description: In the devastating aftermath of Hurricane Helene, and with another monster storm bearing down on Florida, the issue of how the Federal Emergency Manag...

item.title: Is the Trump campaign’s male-dominated culture losing women votes?
item.description: The campaign views men as Trump’s path to victory, and many staffers talk like it.

item.title: OpenAI to Open Asia-Pacific Hub in Singapore
item.description: The maker of ChatGPT plans to open a Singapore office later this year to serve as an Asia-Pacific hub, as it aims to grow its presence in the region.

item.title: Fed moves to protect weakening job market with bold rate cut
item.description: The move signals that the central bank is growing nervous about the declining labor market.

item.title: Lawmakers spending even more in 2024 under receipt-free expense program
item.description: Critics of the program have argued that its lack of receipt requirements and reliance on the honor system opens it up for abuse.

item.title: A Godfather of AI Just Won a Nobel. He Has Been Warning the Machines Could Take Over the World.
item.description: Geoffrey Hinton hopes the prize will add credibility to his claims about the dangers of AI technology he pioneered.

item.title: When Cell Service Is Down, You Can Send iPhone Texts via Satellite
item.description: Hurricane Milton could disrupt phone and Wi-Fi networks. How to stay connected with iOS 18.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on streaming in Canada, Disney’s financials and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: California Illegal Aliens May Get to Push #1 for a Phone Subsidy
item.description: For years mass immigration advocates have rejected any meaningful distinction in status between illegal aliens and legal immigrants. As such, many sta...

item.title: The candidate taking on an election denier — by focusing on other things
item.description: Pennsylvania’s Janelle Stelson and other Democrats have weaved Jan. 6 into a broader narrative of Washington run amok.

item.title: Foreign Gangs Bring Our Cities Close to War
item.description: The border crisis has allowed previously unknown foreign gangs to enter the U.S. and clash with domestic gangs. To read the rest of the article click ...

item.title: No Matter Who Writes the Check, U.S. Taxpayers Bear the Burden of Illegal Immigration
item.description: Mass immigration advocates have what they think is a nifty new idea to deal with the soaring state and local cost of illegal immigration, now estimate...

item.title: Amazon to Add 20 New U.S. Cities to Same-Day Pharmacy Delivery Business
item.description: Amazon.com said it plans to further expand its pharmacy business by more than doubling the number of cities where customers can get same-day delivery ...
